sentences.sContent: Even the too-near table of boisterous boys contributes to its euphony.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even the too-near table of boisterous boys contributes to its euphony.
sentences.sCn: 连近旁谈笑的年轻人也贡献出了悦耳之声。

sentences.sContent: Therefore, I always think that poetry is forever the best euphony in high pitch in the deep of human soul.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, I always think that poetry is forever the best euphony in high pitch in the deep of human soul.
sentences.sCn: 因此，我常以为：诗歌永远是人类心灵深处最悦耳的高音。

synos.tran: 悦耳之音；悦耳；和谐的声音

words.tran: 悦耳的，语调好的；音调上的
